Module com.library
Package com.library.Models

Class Book

java.lang.Object
com.library.Models.Book
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Book extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a book in a library system. Implements the Serializable interface to allow for object serialization.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book(String title, String author, String publicationHouse, String isbn, String publicationDate, String category)
      Constructs a new Book object with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the book.
      author - The author's name of the book.
      publicationHouse - The publication house of the book.
      isbn - The International Standard Book Number (ISBN) of the book.
      publicationDate - The publication date of the book in the format "YYYY-MM-DD".
      category - The category of the book.

  • Method Details

    • getUuid

      public UUID getUuid()
      Returns the unique identifier of the book.
      Returns:
      The UUID of the book.

    • getrating

      public double getrating()
      Returns the average rating of the book.
      Returns:
      The average rating of the book. The rating is a double value between 0 and 5, inclusive. If no ratings have been given, the method returns 0.

    • getCategory

      public String getCategory()
      Returns the category of the book.
      Returns:
      The category of the book. The category is a string that represents the genre or theme of the book.

    • setTitle

      public void setTitle(String title)
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the book

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Returns the title of the book.
      Returns:
      The title of the book. The title is a string that represents the name of the book.

    • addUserComment

      public void addUserComment(UUID uuid, String commentText)
      Adds a user comment to the book.
      Parameters:
      uuid - The unique identifier of the user who made the comment.
      commentText - The text of the comment.

    • getUserComment

      public List<Comment> getUserComment()
      Returns the list of user comments for the book.
      Returns:
      A list of Comment objects, each containing the unique identifier of the user who made the comment and the text of the comment.

    • displayBookDetails

      public void displayBookDetails()
      Displays the details of the book, including its title, author, publication house, ISBN, publication date, copy number, number of users, and user comments.
